alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 3:03PM EDT until November 01 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: .Correcting end time of headline to Wed Nov 1. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Wind gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
